resources.string: YOU DON"T HAVE PERMISSION TO ACCESS. CONTACT AN ADMINISTRATOR OR \nGO TO THE HOME PAGE AND BROWSE OTHER PAGES.
Please sign in as an OWNER or as an AGENT to add a property to uptown.
Hi! I found your listing on Uptown, and I"d like to book a tour. Can you please confirm this time slot?

Once in a life time opportunity to lease the Entire Apartment block. This boutique apartment block of 3 individual apartments plus a Roof top is located in the heart of Colombo with access to all amenities.
